job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions.
   * Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark.
   * Develop projects through proof-of-concept, pilot and full deployment phases.
   * Further develop the AI components in our data platform to improve our technical infrastructure, standards of working and tool stack.
   * Integrate the final model with other aspects of the application; design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..).
   * Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
   * Experiment with new ideas, technologies and data to stay posted on the latest developments and identify new use cases to leverage them.
job_details.full_text:
Engineer AI

* Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions.
   * Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark.
   * Develop projects through proof-of-concept, pilot and full deployment phases.
   * Further develop the AI components in our data platform to improve our technical infrastructure, standards of working and tool stack.
   * Integrate the final model with other aspects of the application; design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..).
   * Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
   * Experiment with new ideas, technologies and data to stay posted on the latest developments and identify new use cases to leverage them.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and deploying AI solutions, integrating models with applications via APIs, and experimenting with new technologies. While it mentions 'model based solutions' and 'AI components', the focus on 'scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment', 'integrating the final model with other aspects of the application', and 'design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..)' strongly aligns with the responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer who builds user-facing systems. The mention of 'data platform' and 'Apache spark' suggests data engineering aspects, but the core is application development around AI. The 'ML Engineer' profile is less fitting as the emphasis is not solely on predictive modeling algorithms but on the integration and deployment of AI solutions into applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions' directly indicates understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark' implies the need for data pipeline and infrastructure work within a cloud environment using big data processing tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'AI / model based solutions' and 'Further develop the AI components in our data platform' suggests the creation, development, or adaptation of AI models.
The phrase 'Further develop the AI components in our data platform' indicates ongoing work and improvement of AI models or systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Further develop the AI components in our data platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate the final model with other aspects of the application; design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..)' clearly describes building software components, specifically focusing on API integration and inter-component communication.
